title: Ticket #2278: JAVA_CLASSPATH_DEFAULT has broken default value on windows
description:
from Mick Beaver:

The Windows installer sets JAVA_CLASSPATH_DEFAULT as: 

JAVA_CLASSPATH_DEFAULT =3D $(LIB) $(LIB)/scimark2lib.jar .

However, the relevant Java files are placed in Bin. My working config file looks like: 

JAVA_CLASSPATH_DEFAULT =3D $(BIN) $(BIN)/scimark2lib.jar .
remarks:
2011-Jun-29 14:47:03 by ziliang:
This fix should be done in the awk script, not the installer.
check_ins: 2011-Jun-29 16:34   Check-in [22344]: Patch the JAVA_CLASSPATH_DEFAULT config value for Windows. Ticket #2278. (By Ziliang Guo )
creator: johnkn
